short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the Administrator bottom bar tag from YouTube pages if it exists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily get rid of the persistent white "Administrator" bar at the bottom of your YouTube screen. This extension automatically removes the bar across all YouTube domains, providing a cleaner and more focused viewing experience.
